sentence: Provide free snorkeling equipment with the room
Hotel has all amenities and the LUAU Dance the HOTEL was great
Excellent staff facilities bars and adjacent to some wonderful snorkeling
We called security and saw the boy and his mom in the lobby
The rest of the staff we encountered from the restaurant bar cleaning staff was all very positive and the facility was very nice
Lovely resort facilities and excellent for relaxing
The amenities were great the pools entire landscape absolutely tropical beautiful
Great friendly staff the resort is at a great location with great amenities and awesome beach for swimming and snorkeling
Awesome location and amenities great pool for kids
The facilities were well kept and clean
We were up early to take a day tour and noticed a paper posted in the elevator that said there was a work stoppage and that housekeeping service would be effected as well as the restaurants
Because the hotel workers here are on strike there are very few if any of the amenities advertised on their website
As other guests have mentioned trash and dirty towels were piled up in the hallways and collected infrequently
Was a bit of an adventure to get there from the lobby but we loved the privacy and setting

If they present these in the morning do n’t they know how many chairs they haveThe interior restrooms for lobby spaces and buffet constantly had toilets clogged or were flooding not sure if they were having pipe issues
In addition when I asked if I was near the elevator or stairs I was assured that although I was noise would not be a problem

Also when we checked in they completely downplayed the actual construction that was going on saying that they were just redoing their lobby when in fact their entire middle part of the hotel was blocked off and under construction
Then you go to a different hut to rent snorkel equipment
but we found a better place to park near Building 6 and it became a very easy walk with an elevator or two
Then walk over a bridge to another elevator which we had to go down to get to our room
